text: Beebe Freitas (August 28, 1938 - February 17, 2018) was an American pianist, organist, vocal coach and educator. She was the Head of Music for Hawaii Opera Theatre. She was born in Youngstown, Ohio. Freitas died at her home in Aina Haina, Hawaii on February 17, 2018 of congestive heart failure at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American pianists Category:Educators from Ohio Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Singers from Ohio Category:Writers from Ohio Category:Singers from Hawaii Category:Musicians from Hawaii Category:Writers from Hawaii Category:Musicians from Youngstown, Ohio Category:Educators from Hawaii
title: Beebe Freitas
